sen.j: 御料車（ごりょうしゃ）とは、日本の天皇および皇族が乗車するための車両のことである。
sen.e: Goryosha is a car which is designed for Japanese Emperor and Imperial family.
Goryosha is a car which is designed for the Japanese Emperor and the Imperial family.
Goryosha is a car which is designed for the Japanese Emperor and the Imperial family.

sen.j: 「御料車」の「御料」とは、高貴な人の所有物・利用物の意である。
sen.e: "Goryo" means the belongings of noble person.
"Goryo" means the belongings of a noble person.
Goryo' means the belongings of a noble person.

sen.j: 自動車の御料車は「菊の自動車」とも呼ばれ、国賓来訪の接遇・国会などの儀式・地方への訪問などで、皇室と国民との接点としても頻繁に使用される。
sen.e: Goryosha is also called "Kiku no jidosha (car of chrysanthemum)" and often used for the reception of national guests, ceremony of the Diet and visit to rural areas which is a contact between Imperial family and citizens.

Goryosha is also called "Kiku no jidosha (car of the chrysanthemum)"and is often used for the reception of national guests, ceremonies of the Diet and visits to rural areas for contact between the Imperial family and citizens.

Goryosha is also called "Kiku no jidosha" (car of the chrysanthemum) and is often used for the reception of national guests, ceremonies of the Diet and visits to rural areas for contact between the Imperial family and citizens.

sen.j: 一般にナンバープレートがある位置と後部ドア付近に菊の紋章が施され、前方・後方のドアが観音開きの構造になっているのが特色である。
sen.e: The characteristics of goryosha are the (Imperial) crest of the chrysanthemum put on the point where number plate is set and near the rear door and the (hinged) double doors of front and rear doors.

The characteristics of goryosha are the (Imperial) crest of the chrysanthemum placed where number plate is usually displayed, and near the rear door and the (hinged) double doors of front and rear doors.

The characteristics of goryosha are the (Imperial) crest of the chrysanthemum placed where number plate is usually displayed, and near the rear door and the (hinged) double doors of front and rear doors.

sen.j: ボンネットに紅の地に金の紋章が描かれた「天皇旗」が取り付けられる事もある。
sen.e: Sometimes a red "Emperor flag" with a gold crest is put on the hood.
Sometimes a red "Emperor flag" with a gold crest is put on the hood.
Sometimes a red 'Emperor flag' with a gold crest is put on the hood.

sen.j: 御料車は専属の運転手が運転するが、天皇や他の皇族の多くが車好きとして知られ、皇居内などでは日本車を中心に自らステアリングを握って運転している。
sen.e: Goryosha is driven by an exclusive chauffeur, but it is known that most Emperor and other Imperial families like cars and they drive a car (mostly Japanese car) by themselves in the premises of Imperial Palace.

Goryosha is driven by an exclusive chauffeur, but it is known that most Emperor and other Imperial families like cars and they drive a car (mostly Japanese car) by themselves in the premises of the Imperial Palace.

Goryosha is driven by an exclusive chauffeur, but it is known that most Emperor and other Imperial families like cars and they drive a car (mostly Japanese car) by themselves in the premises of the Imperial Palace.

sen.j: 中でも、秋篠宮文仁親王がフォルクスワーゲン・タイプ1を所有し、主に軽井沢で運転しているのは有名な話である。
sen.e: In particular, it is a famous story that Akishinonomiya Imperial prince Fumihito has a Volkswagen Type 1 and drive that mainly in Karuizawa.
In particular, a well known story is that Akishinonomiya Imperial prince Fumihito has a Volkswagen Type 1 and drives it mainly in Karuizawa.
In particular, a well known story is that Akishinonomiya Imperial Prince Fumihito has a Volkswagen Type 1 and drives it mainly in Karuizawa.

sen.j: 宮内庁側近の話によると「慎重で真面目な運転姿勢」らしい。
sen.e: According to an aide in Imperial Household Agency, "his driving is careful and serious".
According to an aide in the Imperial Household Agency, "his driving is careful and serious."
According to an aide in the Imperial Household Agency, 'his driving is careful and serious.'

sen.j: 通常のナンバープレートが付けられている日常公務用の送迎車もあり、天皇・皇后用はトヨタ・センチュリー、皇太子一家用はトヨタ・アルファード、秋篠宮一家用は日産・フーガ（それぞれ違う車種の場合もあり）が用意されている。
sen.e: There are chauffeur-driven cars for daily official business with normal number plate:TOYOTA Century for Emperor and Empress, TOYOTA ALPHARD for the family of prince royal and Nissan FUGA for the Akishinonomiya family (the car models vary).

There are chauffeur-driven cars for daily official business with normal number plate:TOYOTA Century for the Emperor and Empress, TOYOTA ALPHARD for the family of the royal prince and Nissan FUGA for the Akishinonomiya family (the car models vary).

There are chauffeur-driven cars for daily official business with normal number plate: TOYOTA Century for the Emperor and Empress, TOYOTA ALPHARD for the family of the royal prince and Nissan FUGA for the Akishinonomiya family (the car models vary).

sen.j: それまでの馬車に代わり、初めて自動車の御料車が導入されたのは1912年である。
sen.e: It was 1912 that the first automobile goryosha was installed instead of carriage which has been used until then.
It was 1912 that the first automobile goryosha was installed instead of carriage which has been used until then.
It was 1912 that the first automobile goryosha was installed instead of carriage which has been used until then.

sen.j: 初代はイギリスから輸入されたデイムラー・ランドレー。
sen.e: The first goryosha was Daimler Laundaulet imported from England.
The first goryosha was a Daimler Laundaulet imported from England.
The first goryosha was a Daimler Laundaulet imported from England.

sen.j: デイムラーはイギリス王室で初めて御料車に採用された名車であり、その実績を評価されての導入だった。
sen.e: Daimler was introduced because of the fact that it was adopted by British Royal Family as their first goryosha.
Daimler was introduced because of the fact that it was adopted by the British Royal Family as their first goryosha.
Daimler was introduced because of the fact that it was adopted by the British Royal Family as their first goryosha.

sen.j: 2代目は、1921年に導入されたロールス・ロイス。
sen.e: Rolls -Royce was introduced as the second goryosha in 1921.
Rolls -Royce was introduced as the second goryosha in 1921.
Rolls-Royce was introduced as the second goryosha in 1921.

sen.j: 1990年からはオープンカーが採用され、今上天皇の即位の礼後のパレードの際に使用、その後1993年に行われた皇太子夫妻の結婚パレードの際にも使用された。
sen.e: A convertible was adopted in 1990 and used in the parade performed after the enthronement ceremony of the present Emperor, then used in the wedding parade of the Crown Prince and Crown Princess performed in 1993.

A convertible was adopted in 1990 and used in a parade performed after the enthronement ceremony of the present Emperor, then used in the wedding parade of the Crown Prince and Crown Princess performed in 1993.

A convertible was adopted in 1990 and used in a parade performed after the enthronement ceremony of the present Emperor, then used in the wedding parade of the Crown Prince and Crown Princess performed in 1993.

sen.j: 3代目は、1932年に導入されたメルセデス・ベンツ。
sen.e: Mercedes-Benz was introduced as the third goryosha in 1932.
Mercedes-Benz was introduced as the third goryosha in 1932.
Mercedes-Benz was introduced as the third goryosha in 1932.

sen.j: 第二次世界大戦の足音が聞こえ始めた時期で、イギリス製のロールスロイスは1936年で御料車から外され、友好国であったドイツ製のメルセデス・ベンツが採用された。
sen.e: At the beginning of World War II, British Rolls -Royce was removed in 1936 and Mercedes-Benz which was made in Germany, a friendly nation was adopted.
At the beginning of World War II, a British Rolls -Royce was removed in 1936 and Mercedes-Benz which was made in Germany, a friendly nation at the time, was adopted.
Just before the World War II, a British Rolls-Royce was removed in 1936 and Mercedes-Benz which was made in Germany, a friendly nation at the time, was adopted.
sen.cmt: スペース削除At the beginning of→Just before

sen.j: 1968年まで採用され、戦後の昭和天皇の全国行幸では日本国中を走り、活躍した。
sen.e: It has been adopted until 1968, it ran all over Japan when Emperor Showa traveled throughout the country after the war.
It has been used until 1968, it ran all over Japan when Emperor Showa traveled throughout the country after the war.
It has been used until 1968, it ran all over Japan when Emperor Showa traveled throughout the country after the war.

sen.j: 4代目は、1951年に導入されたゼネラルモーターズ・キャディラック。
sen.e: General Mortors Cadillac was introduced as the fourth goryosha in 1951.
A General Motors Cadillac was introduced as the fourth goryosha in 1951.
A General Motors Cadillac was introduced as the fourth goryosha in 1951.

sen.j: 太平洋戦争終結後アメリカ合衆国の統治下にあったため、アメリカ製が採用された。
sen.e: When Japan was under American rule after the Pacific War ended, American car was adopted.
When Japan was under American rule after the Pacific War ended, an American car was adopted.
When Japan was under American rule after the Pacific War ended, an American car was adopted.

sen.j: 5代目は、1967年に導入された日産・プリンスロイヤル。
sen.e: Nissan Prince Royal was introduced as the fifth goryosha in 1967.
Nissan Prince Royal was introduced as the fifth goryosha in 1967.
Nissan Prince Royal was introduced as the fifth goryosha in 1967.

sen.j: 後に日産自動車と企業合併したプリンス自動車工業が開発・製造した名車として知られ、イギリスのエリザベス2世を始め各国の要人を乗せ、昭和天皇の大喪の礼・今上天皇の即位式などで使用され、戦後の重要な役割を果たした。
sen.e: It is known as a great car which was developed and manufactured by Prince Motor Corporation merged with Nissan Motor Co., Ltd. later, it played postwar significant role, for example, it was used for transportation of foreign dignitaries like Elizabeth Ⅱ of England, the Rites of an Imperial Funeral of Emperor Showa and the enthronement ceremony of the present Emperor.
sen.cmt: プリンス自動車工業→Prince Motor Corporation[定訳不明]
sen.e: It is known as a great car which was developed and manufactured by Prince Motor Corporation merged with Nissan Motor Co., Ltd. later, it played a significant postwar role, for example, it was used for transportation of foreign dignitaries like Elizabeth Ⅱ of England, the Rites of an Imperial Funeral for Emperor Showa and the enthronement ceremony of the present Emperor.

It is known as a great car which was developed and manufactured by Prince Motor Corporation merged with Nissan Motor Co., Ltd. later, it played a significant postwar role, for example, it was used for transportation of foreign dignitaries like Elizabeth Ⅱ of England, the Rites of an Imperial Funeral for Emperor Showa and the enthronement ceremony of the present Emperor.

sen.j: 現在も、国会開会式などの重要な公務においては、後述のトヨタ・センチュリーではなく、リムジンタイプの同車が使用されているが、老朽化のため、2006年以降、順次トヨタ・センチュリーロイヤルへの置き換えが予定されている。
sen.e: Still now, not TOYOTA Century to be described, but limousine type of Nissan Prince Royal is used for the important official business such as the opening ceremony of Diet, but it will be gradually replaced by TOYOTA Century Royal after 2006 due to the aging.

Still now, not TOYOTA Century to be described, but limousine type of Nissan Prince Royal is used for the important official business such as for the opening ceremony of the Diet, but it will be gradually replaced by a TOYOTA Century Royal after 2006 due to aging.

Still now, not TOYOTA Century to be described, but limousine type of Nissan Prince Royal is used for the important official business such as for the opening ceremony of the Diet, but it will be gradually replaced by a TOYOTA Century Royal after 2006 due to aging.

sen.j: 6代目は、1989年に導入されたトヨタ・センチュリー。
sen.e: TOYOTA Century was introduced as the sixth goryosha in 1989.
A TOYOTA Century was introduced as the sixth goryosha in 1989.
A TOYOTA Century was introduced as the sixth goryosha in 1989.

sen.j: 日本車の性能も格段に向上し、日本最大の自動車会社であるトヨタ自動車の最高級車センチュリーが採用された。
sen.e: Since Japanese cars dramatically improved in performance, Japanese largest automobile company, TOYOTA MOTOR CORPORATION's best car, Century was adopted.
Since Japanese cars dramatically improved in performance, Japanese largest automobile company, TOYOTA MOTOR CORPORATION's best car, Century was adopted.
Since Japanese cars dramatically improved in performance, Japanese largest automobile company, TOYOTA MOTOR CORPORATION's best car, Century was adopted.

sen.j: 御料車としては初のセダンタイプであり、地方行幸啓など通常公務で使用されている。
sen.e: It was the first sedan as goryosha and used for daily official business such as Emperor's traveling to rural areas.
It was the first sedan as goryosha and was used for daily official business such as when the Emperor traveled to rural areas.
It was the first sedan as goryosha and was used for daily official business such as when the Emperor traveled to rural areas.

sen.j: 7代目は、2006年に導入されたトヨタ・センチュリーロイヤル。
sen.e: TOYOTA Century Royal was introduced as the seventh goryosha in 2006.
A TOYOTA Century Royal was introduced as the seventh goryosha in 2006.
A TOYOTA Century Royal was introduced as the seventh goryosha in 2006.

sen.j: 2006年7月に1台が宮内庁に納入され、8月15日の全国戦没者追悼式から使用される予定であったが、9月28日の臨時国会開会式に出席する際から使用された。
sen.e: The first one was delivered to the Imperial Household Agency in July 2006 and it was planned to be used for the memorial service for those who died in war on August 15, but in fact, it was used for the opening ceremony of extraordinary Diet on September 28 for the first time.

The first one was delivered to the Imperial Household Agency in July 2006 and it was planned to be used for a memorial service for those who died in war on August 15, but in fact, it was used for the opening ceremony of extraordinary Diet on September 28 for the first time.

The first one was delivered to the Imperial Household Agency in July 2006 and it was planned to be used for a memorial service for those who died in war on August 15, but in fact, it was used for the opening ceremony of extraordinary Diet on September 28 for the first time.

sen.j: 今後も順次3台が納入されることになっており、最終的に4台体制（うち寝台車1台）となる予定である。
sen.e: Other three cars will be gradually delivered from now and it will be four cars (including 1 sleeping car) in the end.
Three other cars will gradually be delivered from now and it will actually be four cars (including 1 sleeping car) in the end.
Three other cars will gradually be delivered from now and it will in fact be four cars (including 1 sleeping car) in the end.

sen.j: 現在（年）、ロールスロイス・オープンカーが1台、プリンスロイヤルが5台、センチュリーが4台の計10台が使用されている。
sen.e: Currently, 10 goryosha are used: one Rolls -Royce (convertible type), five Prince Royal and four Century.
Currently, 10 goryosha are used: one Rolls -Royce (convertible type), five Prince Royals and four Centuries
Currently, 10 goryosha are used: one Rolls-Royce (convertible type), five Prince Royals and four Centuries

sen.j: 鉄道車両同様、通常は大切に保管され、使用時には入念な整備が施される。
sen.e: Like rail cars, Goryosha are stored with caution and careful maintenance is performed before they are used.
Like rail cars, Goryosha are stored carefully and maintenance is performed before they are used.
Like rail cars, Goryosha are stored carefully and maintenance is performed before they are used.

sen.j: 御料車のナンバープレートは直径約10cmの円形で、銀色の下地に漢字で「皇」の一字と数字が金色で描かれている。
sen.e: The number plate of goryosha is round and the diameter is around 10 centimeters, the base color is silver and a Chinese character "皇" and numbers are drawn in gold on that.
The number plate for the goryosha is round and the diameter is around 10 centimeters, the base color is silver and a Chinese character "皇" and numbers are drawn in gold.
The number plate for the goryosha is round and the diameter is around 10 centimeters, the base color is silver and a Chinese character "皇" and numbers are drawn in gold.

sen.j: このナンバープレートを一般のナンバープレートに相当するものとして扱う事が道路運送車両法（道路運送車両法施行規則第11条第2項）により規定されている。
sen.e: The Road Transport Vehicle Law Article 11(2) stipulates that such number plate should be treated same as general number plate.
The Road Transport Vehicle Law Article 11(2) stipulates that such number plate should be treated same as a general number plate.
The Road Transport Vehicle Law Article 11(2) stipulates that such number plate should be treated same as a general number plate.

sen.j: ナンバープレートがある以上、車検の対象となる。
sen.e: Because it has a number plate, goryosha is also a subject of car safety inspection.
Because it has a number plate, a goryosha is also subjected to car safety inspections.
Because it has a number plate, a goryosha is also subjected to car safety inspections.
